If.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(Colors.MediumPurple, "[Profile Message!]: ", Colors.Yellow, "Please stand by as the functions are being activated!");

Code.Lua: if not EncounterJournal then EncounterJournal_LoadUI() end ToggleFrame(EncounterJournal); EJSuggestFrame_OpenFrame(); C_AdventureJournal.ActivateEntry(1);
